Relaxing. Refreshing. Sunny. Filled with fruit and flavor. Yes, that describes your ideal summer, but also the shandy, the season’s most accessible cocktail. Keep a premixed batch of fresh juice and seasoning in your fridge to pour into a glass of light beer and ice whenever the sunny vibe needs to be turned up to 11.Ingredients6-8 servings6oz. Campari2cup strained fresh orange juice½cup fresh lime juice2tsp. Aleppo-style pepper1tsp. kosher salt4–612-oz. bottles chilled light beerPreparationStep 1Vigorously stir Campari, orange juice, lime juice, Aleppo-style pepper, and salt in a large pitcher. Chill until ready to serve.Step 2To make 1 drink, pour about 8 oz. beer into an ice-filled glasses and add Campari mixture to your liking.Step 3Do ahead: Campari mixture can be made 2 days ahead.
